mapper.select: SELECT RESIDENT_ENROLL_CAR, BD_NM, RM_NM, CAR_NUM, ENROLL_PURPOSE, CAR_NM, CAR_TYPE, RESIDENT_NM FROM RESIDENT_ENROLL_CAR REC JOIN RESIDENT R ON(R.RESIDENT_SEQ = REC.RESIDENT_SEQ) JOIN APT_DETAIL_INFO ADIS ON (R.APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ = ADIS.APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESIDENT_ENROLL_CAR (RESIDENT_ENROLL_CAR, RESIDENT_SEQ, CAR_TYPE, CAR_NM, ENROLL_PURPOSE, ENROLL_DT, CAR_NUM) VALUES (RESIDENT_ENROLL_CAR_SEQ.nextval, (SELECT RESIDENT_SEQ FROM RESIDENT WHERE APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ = (SELECT APT_DETAIL_INFO_SEQ FROM APT_DETAIL_INFO WHERE BD_NM = #{bdNm} AND RM_NM = #{rmNm} ) AND RESIDENT_NM = #{residentNm}), #{carType}, #{carNm}, #{enrollPurpose},sysdate, #{carNum})
